posts.title: 2025-26 Season Kickoff - Registration Now Open
posts.author: Coach Dave
posts.body:
The 2025-26 wrestling season is here! Registration is now open for both our Youth Club and High School programs.

Youth Club Program

Our youth program is open to wrestlers in grades K-8. Practices begin November 1st at the Fowlerville Community Center. No experience necessary - we welcome beginners and experienced wrestlers alike.

High School Program

High school practices begin October 28th in the Fowlerville High School wrestling room. All returning wrestlers and newcomers should attend the first practice.

Visit our program pages for full schedule details and registration information.

posts.title: Preseason Training Camp Wrap-Up
posts.author: Coach Dave
posts.body:
Our preseason training camp was a great success this year. We had strong attendance from both returning wrestlers and incoming freshmen.

The coaching staff focused on fundamental positioning, chain wrestling concepts, and building a strong conditioning base for the season ahead.

Key takeaways from camp:

  • Strong returning core at the middle weights
  • Several promising freshmen ready to contribute
  • Improved team conditioning compared to last year

We're excited about the potential of this year's squad. Stay tuned for roster announcements and the full season schedule.
